name: Ifa
introduction: IfaIn the Wake of Wandering WindsCardWishIn-GameQualityWeaponCatalystElementModel TypeAnemoTall MaleCharacter RolesOn-FieldSupportSurvivabilityBioVoice ActorsBirthdayMarch 23rdConstel­lationCatena OpeleRegionNatlanAffil­i­a­tionTlalocanSpecial DishEmotional SupportNamecardIfa: BroHow to ObtainWishesFeaturedCurrent:Ends in 19 daysRelease DateMay 07, 20258 months agoGenius Invokation TCGCharacter CardStagesEnglishJonny Loquasto[1]Cacucu:Dominic Catrambone[2]ChineseLu Shujun (吕书君)[3]Cacucu:Lu Shujun (吕书君)[4]JapaneseTerashima Junta (寺島惇太)[5]Cacucu:Komatsu Shouhei (小松昌平)[5]KoreanPark Ki-wook (박기욱)[6]Cacucu:Park Ki-wook (박기욱)[7]Additional TitlesCategoriesTlalocan VetPlayable Characters Ifais a playableAnemocharacterinGenshin Impact. Ifa is a renownedSaurianveterinarian from theFlower-Feather Clan. He is friends withOroronand often delivers vegetables toCitlalion his behalf.[8] When Ororon was avoiding her during his collaboration withCapitano, Citlali asked Ifa to deliver the gem replacement for the talisman that keeps his soul stable. This was actually a ploy to copy Ororon's memories onto the old gem, but Ifa, not knowing anything, agreed to do the delivery without asking any questions.[9] Cacucuis aQucusaurusassistant of Ifa's at his clinic and also considers himself Ifa's "brother." Cacucu learned several of Ifa's catchphrases and despite fully understanding the human language, can only repeat these catchphrases to communicate due to the limited nature of his vocal cords.[10]

name: Noelle
introduction: NoelleChivalric BlossomCardWishIn-GameQualityWeaponClaymoreElementModel TypeGeoMedium FemaleCharacter RolesOn-FieldDPSSurvivabilityBioVoice ActorsBirthdayMarch 21stConstel­lationParma CordisRegionMondstadtAffil­i­a­tionKnights of FavoniusSpecial DishLighter-Than-Air PancakeNamecardNoelle: ProtectorHow to ObtainWishesPaimon's BargainsFeaturedPrevious:Ran 1 year, 6 months agoRelease DateSeptember 28, 20205 years, 3 months agoGenius Invokation TCGCharacter CardStagesEnglishLaura Faye Smith[1]ChineseYanning (宴宁)[2]JapaneseTakao Kanon (高尾奏音)[1]KoreanLee Bo-hee (이보희)[3]Additional TitlesCategoriesMaid of FavoniusPlayable Characters Noelleis a playableGeocharacterinGenshin Impact. Extremely strong and reliable, Noelle is considered to be "the maid of all maids" in theKnights of Favonius, with many thinking she has the ability to be everywhere all at once. She is stubborn, however, and willing to unnecessarily endanger her life at any moment to help someone. She has tried many times to join the ranks of the Knights of Favonius to accomplish her dream of becoming a full-fledged knight, but has fallen short every time so far.

name: Traveler
introduction: TravelerDescenderCard (Aether)Card (Lumine)In-Game (Aether)In-Game (Lumine)QualityWeaponSwordElementModel TypeNoneAether:Medium MaleLumine:Medium FemaleBioRelativesVoice ActorsReal Name(‍AetherText for male Traveler‍/‍LumineText for female Traveler‍)[1]BirthdayPlayer's ChoiceConstel­lationViator(male)Viatrix(female)Affil­i­a­tion—Release DateSeptember 28, 20205 years, 3 months agoBiological ‍ⓘFamily members related by blood lineage (consanguinity) or marriage. Does not include synthetic relatives.‍Sibling:Traveler's Sibling[5]EnglishAether:Zach Aguilar[2]Lumine:Sarah Miller-Crews[2]ChineseAether:Luyin (鹿喑)[3]Lumine:Yanning (宴宁)[3]JapaneseAether:Horie Shun (堀江瞬)[2]Lumine:Yuuki Aoi (悠木碧)[2]KoreanAether:Lee Kyeong-tae (이경태)[4]Lumine:Lee Sae-ah (이새아)[4]CategoriesPlayable Characters TheTraveleris the playable protagonist ofGenshin Impact. In the opening cutscene, twin siblings from another world travel through the universe, untilAsmodayblocked their path. The player gets to choose eitherAether(male) orLumine(female) as the Traveler and theTraveler's Siblingbecomes captured. Their power to travel is sealed, leaving them stranded onTeyvat. They savePaimonby fishing her out of the water and she accompanies them as their new travel companion. Together they set out on a journey to findThe Sevenand reunite with the Traveler's lost sibling. Although players can choose the name they want to be referred by, theTraveler's Siblingrefers to the Traveler by their real name, regardless of their custom name. InNatlan, the Traveler also gains theAncient NameTMN("TMN,"Tumaini).

sections.Elemental Alignment: At the beginning of the game and inThe Crux ClashinChapter II: Prologue -Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves, the Traveler is "unaligned," a special elemental state exclusive to them. When unaligned, the color of the Traveler's "vision" and background when they are selected in theCharacter Menuis gray. Although the Traveler's Profile lists theirConstellationproperly as Viator/Viatrix, attempting to open the Constellation tab will show a blank screen with "Constellation Unavailable" in the bottom-right corner. When unaligned, the Traveler has only one talent, Normal Attack:Past Memories. When unaligned, screens that show character cards with their elements show a gray "no" symbol (🚫︎) in the place of the element symbol. Shortly after the beginning of the game, the Traveler will unlock theirAnemoTalents and Constellation by resonating with the firstStatue of The SeveninMondstadt. They can resonate with any other Statue of The Seven they find and change their element to match the statue's element.SeeTeyvatfor each region's element. However, the Traveler does not immediately gain thePyroelement upon resonating with a Statue of The Seven inNatlan, due to corruptedLey Linesin the region. They instead unlock their abilities duringWhere All Hopes LieinChapter V: Act V -Incandescent Ode of Resurrection, and are able to properly resonate with Natlan's Statues of the Seven following this quest.
sections.Availability: TheTraveleris obtained at the start of the game and is not featured in anyWishes.

name: Wonderland Manekin
introduction: Wonderland ManekinManekinManekinaQualityWeaponSwordElementModel TypeNoneManekin:Medium MaleManekina:Medium FemaleBioVoice ActorsHow to ObtainMiliastra WonderlandRelease DateOctober 22, 20252 months agoEnglishManekin (Voice C):Edward Stoneguard[1]JapaneseManekin (Voice A):Matsuoka Yoshitsugu (松岡禎丞)[2]Manekin (Voice B):Uchida Yuma (内田雄馬)[2]Manekin (Voice C):Midorikawa Hikaru (緑川光)[2]Manekina (Voice A):Minase Inori (水瀬いのり)[3]Manekina (Voice B):Kanemoto Hisako (金元寿子)[3]Manekina (Voice C):Horie Yui (堀江由衣)[3]CategoriesPlayable Characters TheWonderland Manekinis a playablecharacterinGenshin Impact, serving as the playable character of theMiliastra Wonderlandgameplay mode. After unlocking Miliastra Wonderland, players will gain access to two versions of the Manekin:Manekin(male) andManekina(female). The Manekins can be named, customized withCosmetic Plans, and used in Miliastra Wonderland andTeyvat. In Miliastra Wonderland, players can freely swap between the Manekin and the Manekina at any time. In Teyvat, players have both Manekins simultaneously as separate characters but they cannot both be used in the same team. The Manekin can be used in the open world and most domains, but not in gameplay modes such as theSpiral Abyss,Imaginarium Theater, andStygian Onslaught. Theirelementis set to theTraveler's current element.

sections.Ascensions and Stats: Manekin requires noCharacter EXP Materials,Character Ascension Materials, orMorato level up or ascend. After reaching certain Wonderland Levels in Miliastra Wonderland, Manekin can be ascended to the next ascension, automatically leveling up to the maximum level of that ascension.
sections.Talents: Manekin talents require noCharacter Talent Materialor Mora to level up.  They are automatically raised to their highest level for the Manekin's ascension as you ascend the Manekin.
sections.Availability: Manekin is obtained from Miliastra Wonderland and is not featured in anyWishes.

Does not include synthetic relatives.‍Older sibling:Vedrfolnir[6]EnglishYuri Lowenthal[3]ChineseSun Ye (孙晔)[4]JapaneseTsuda Kenjiro (津田健次郎)[3]KoreanChoi Han (최한)[5]Additional TitlesCategoriesTwilight Sword[1][2]Upcoming Characters Dainsleif, sometimes shortened toDain, is an upcoming playablecharacterinGenshin Impact. He is the featured character forChapter ??of theTeyvat Chapter Storyline, which focuses on the lost kingdom ofKhaenri'ah, as well as the narrator of theCollected Miscellanyvideos. He makes his first in-game appearance in theWorld QuestBough Keeper: DainsleifinChapter I: Act IV - Prelude. Dainsleif is the former knight captain of the Royal Guard ofKhaenri'ah. However, he failed to prevent the destruction of Khaenri'ah 500 years ago. A curse of immortality was placed upon him so that he would forever wanderTeyvat. Dainsleif was announced to be an upcoming playable character on September 27, 2020, in thestreamcelebrating the global release ofGenshin Impact, although he is not expected to be released for a significant amount of time. The listed name of his Vision's element, as announced on his Chinese Character Card, is a set of indecipherable symbols ().[7]

sections.Official Introduction: The confluence between the past and future. The original calamityhad been overturned, yetthe island in the skyset the earth to burn. Dain, what is that strand of blonde hair to you? Someone you must kill? Or the object of your penitence? —A self-proclaimed prophet

Does not include synthetic relatives.‍Parent:Nikita[5]EnglishJonathon Ha[1]ChineseYu Tou (昱头)[2]JapaneseUmeda Shuuichirou (梅田修一朗)[3]KoreanHwang Dong-hyeon (황동현)[4]Additional TitlesCategoriesMember of the investigation squad, the Nightmare OriolesUpcoming Characters Illugais an upcoming playableGeocharacter inGenshin Impact. A young and upcoming man part of theLightkeepersas a Ratnik and is the adoptive son ofNikita, the currentStarshyna.

sections.Official Introduction: For new members joining theLightkeepers, few things are more fortunate than having a leader like Illuga. Though Lightkeepers witness the tragic aftermath of theWild Hunt's rampages every day, and the atmosphere in their quarters can often grow heavy and oppressive, Illuga somehow remains positive. He not only manages all tasks efficiently but also offers careful, thoughtful support to his teammates. Walking beside him, it feels as if even the lantern in your hand glows a little warmer. Some people wonder why someone like him hasn't chosen to work in logistics, but instead insists on going to the dangerous frontlines. Without unwavering resolve and strong inner drive, even optimistic smiles will one day be drowned by the purple-black despair. Yet whenever they hear Illuga recite the Lightkeepers' oath with conviction, such doubts vanish from their hearts — undoubtedly, beneath his gentle exterior burns a fierce, blazing fire. What are the ideals and beliefs of the Lightkeepers? This is the question newcomers ask most often, and each Lightkeeper would answer differently. Yet there is always a common thread in these answers — protection and salvation, steadfastness and unwavering resolve. They speak of a bright outcome, or a noble vision, grand and magnificent beyond measure. But Illuga desires little beyond defeating the Wild Hunt, for he realizes that, in its current state,Piramidaalready embodies that ideal. Only those who have endured the nightmare can truly grasp how precious the daylight is. What he wishes to protect is simple — the present.

name: Zibai
introduction: ZibaiWhite Horse's Fleeting SpringCardQualityWeaponSwordElementGeoBioVoice ActorsConstel­lationEqua AlbaRegionLiyueAffil­i­a­tionsEight AdeptsCelestiaHow to ObtainEvent Wish — Harmonious AbundanceFeaturedUpcoming:Runs in 19 daysRelease DateFebruary 03, 2026In 2 weeksEnglishLaura Welsh[1]ChineseMace[2]JapaneseFukuen Misato (福圓美里)[3]KoreanChun Song-e (천송이)[4]Additional TitlesCategoriesThe White Horse Adeptus from Liyue's legendsUpcoming CharactersAngels Zibai(Chinese:兹白Zībái) is an upcoming playableGeocharacter inGenshin Impact.

sections.Official Introduction: Among the people ofLiyue, tales of theAdeptiare ever-abundant. Like the leisurelyadeptus of the cloudswho dispelled droughts with nourishing rain in the "Full Record of Pristine Pavilion," and theGolden-Winged Kingwho purged plagues and banished pestilence in "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti." They are all beings of immense power, guardians of peace in every corner of the land, who the people hold in reverence and awe. And there was, in particular, a certain White Horse Adeptus, whose trail pervades many a book and folktale. Some say she became a steed as white as snow and, in the days of theArchon War, aidedRex Lapisin attaining supremacy over the mortal realm. Others whisper that her eyes, like amber touched with gold, hold the power to gaze through the desolate wastelands of time itself. Still others claim she has always lived on themoon, listening to the wishes of mortals, and keeping watch over the world of flickering lights below. Yet, amidst all these different accounts, none could truly capture her visage, nor paint a likeness of her form. Whether amidst gentle tea-time chatter, or in debates pouring out over ink-filled scrolls, each view was a glimpse through a keyhole — catching naught but fragments, never the full picture. In any case, she was as a shard of blessed light, a wild goose upon the snow, whose footprints vanish with the morning. Still, her yesteryears linger in the mortal dust, and her tale awaits its dawn into the world of the waking.
